message: I'm excited to offer you this product! It's a great deal at $100, and I'm confident you'll love it. Plus, I've had great feedback from other customers who've purchased similar products.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. Given the previous outcome, I think it's best to pass on this product to avoid potential disappointment. I appreciate your efforts in providing high-quality items.
